name: Cosmos (itch) (Kdog1966)
description:
Cosmos is  a game currently in development. I am releasing it as an unfinished prototype in the hopes to get some feedback on it, before deciding if I should finish it off. 

The current art (Loading screens, etc.) are just placeholders, which I will upgrade, if I continue this project. 

It would be incredible if you could let me know what you think of it so far!
